This addon aims to help you managing you currencies.

Currently, it warns the player when your event tickets reach a chosen threshold to be sure to spend them on time and not losing some because of it.

It also provide the same type of warning for writ vouchers.

Each information can be disabled through the settings menu.

To use this addon, you need to install dependencies :
 - [URL="https://www.esoui.com/downloads/info7-LibAddonMenu.html"]LibAddonMenu-2.0[/URL]
